faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

items.question: What is BBQ Menu AI?
items.answer: BBQ Menu AI is an AI-powered recipe generator that creates personalized BBQ menus based on your preferences, budget, and dietary requirements.

items.question: What languages are supported?
items.answer: BBQ Menu AI is available in English, German, and Chinese. Measurement units are automatically adjusted to your language (metric or US customary).

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes! All plans come with a 7-day free trial. No credit card required.

items.question: Can I save my recipes?
items.answer: Yes, with an account you can save your generated recipes, favorite them, and access them anytime.

items.question: How does the shopping list work?
items.answer: After generating a menu, you can add all ingredients to your shopping list with one click. The list shows quantities and estimated prices.
